channel.title: Pages on ObjShadow's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on ObjShadow's Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
Use the most common and easy-to-understand language to write the most hardcore anti-censorship technical content.

This is the slogan of this blog, and it is also the goal, purpose, and original intention of the blog.
Writing these technical contents is to hope that readers can understand the spirit of freedom and human ethics behind anti-censorship,
and also be able to gain insight into the technical principles behind anti-censorship, understand cutting-edge anti-censorship research,
and be able to defend their own information freedom, privacy security, and personal dignity in the digital space.

The main direction of this blog is to analyze the circumvention tools that are currently in practical use,
and popularize some basic anti-censorship technical principles to readers in an easy-to-understand way,
and follow up on large-scale anti-censorship conferences of academic nature such as FOCI, USENIX Security,
try to provide readers with the most understandable, practical, and cutting-edge anti-censorship technical content.

Finally,
I hope that the readers who are reading this article,
will one day break free from this iron cage,
witness that there is no more censorship and totalitarianism in this world,
witness that this blog is no longer necessary,
in the glory of freedom, always remember those
researchers, developers, and propagandists who have contributed to anti-censorship,
and the ordinary people who have tried their best to pursue freedom.

item.title: Links
item.description:
欢迎互换友链!

请在评论区留下你的常用邮箱和网站主页地址。
